events.name: Linux workshop and meetup session
events.description:
We will be having a Linux workshop and meetup session for our penguins to learn and interact with each other. We are currently requesting for permission to use the Red Hat office. Agenda: • Intro to Linux • Choosing Linux Distro • Installation best practices • System and Network configuration • Basic Security • IoT devices and stuff • Social networking session 

Speaker(s): • Michael Rebultan 

Feel free to leave any suggestions or comments in the discussion area.

events.name: UX TL;DR is a learning event where everyone participates!
events.description:
Please sign up here for the meetup: https://generalassemb.ly/education/ux-tldr-meetup-2/singapore/20688 Have you ever come across something new in UX, had the browser tab open for weeks, but never found time to research it? Use this event as an excuse to dig a little deeper. Please bring a laptop or sketchbook. Join to level-up your design and research knowledge, meet other UXers, or learn about the methods used by designers and researchers at the venue. 


7:00 PM - Arrival, seating, & drinks  7:15 PM - Intro talk by the host  7:30 PM - R&D: random team assignment, choose a topic, learn something new  9:00 PM - Q&A: share what your team learned  9:30 - 10:00 PM - The end
events.location: General Assembly Singapore, The Working Capitol, 1 Keong Saik Road, Level 3, Singapore 089101 (Turn left on the side lane beside Lollapalooza and walk up to
